short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Post private or public comments on any site!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will allow you to publish comments that are accessible only to you on any site or publish public comments that will be available to other users who use this extension
